summary: The diff implements most requirements successfully. REQ-1 (landing page), REQ-2 (routing), REQ-3 (theme persistence), REQ-4 (logout redirect), REQ-5 (delete account redirect), and REQ-6 (modal overlay) are all implemented. REQ-7 (backend deleteAccount) is partially implemented but missing removal of editRequests. The required image is referenced but not confirmed to exist in the project.

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify that the backend deleteAccount function in backend/main.mo properly removes all user data including profile, books, reviews/ratings, reading lists, and analytics when called
missing_requirements.reason: The deleteAccount function removes profiles, books, bookSubmissions, readingProgressMap, ratingsMap, bookmarksMap, genrePreferencesMap, and lastAccessTime, but does not remove editRequests associated with the user. The AC specifies 'all user data' which should include edit requests.

missing_requirements.requirement: Full-screen Van Gogh painting for landing page background image (landing-hero.dim_1920x1080.png)
missing_requirements.reason: The LandingPage.tsx references background images at '/assets/generated/landing-dark.dim_1920x1080.png' and '/assets/generated/landing-light.dim_1920x1080.png', but the diff does not show these image files being added. The BuildRequest specified 'landing-hero.dim_1920x1080.png' but the implementation uses different filenames.

hallucinated_features.description: Owl logo image reference in LandingPage.tsx
hallucinated_features.reason: The landing page includes an owl logo image at '/assets/generated/owl-logo.dim_64x64.png' which was not requested in the BuildRequest. No image requirement or acceptance criteria mentioned an owl logo.
The implementation uses separate images for dark and light modes, but the BuildRequest only specified a single 'landing-hero.dim_1920x1080.png' image. The dual-image approach was not requested.
